comments.raw_text: When running certain docshell tests in desktop fennec, this causes some browser front-end code to stop running. Either we should bracket the call in try/catch, or take this patch I whipped up that fixes the problem.
comments.author: josh@joshmatthews.net
comments.text: When running certain docshell tests in desktop fennec, this causes some browser front-end code to stop running. Either we should bracket the call in try/catch, or take this patch I whipped up that fixes the problem.

comments.author: josh@joshmatthews.net
comments.text:
Created attachment 557188
Allow nsDOMWindowUtils::SetDisplayPortForElement to be called on null elements.

comments.raw_text:
Review of attachment 557188:
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Your patch just makes us ignore such calls, apparently.

What makes you think these are not genuine bugs in the tests?
